Reviews.Title: Westinghouse 50"
Reviews.Author: Irving Molina
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first because of reading a few negative reviews, but am very happy I proceeded with my purchase.  The tv is super thin and looks great.  The picture quality is unbelievably sharp.  The sound is as good as can be expected considering all flat screens suffer with lowered quality sound.  The only negative I have seen so far is that it has an spdif coaxial output instead of a digital optical.  I just ordered a converter to resolve this issue. So now I will be able to connect it to my sound bar.  The converter is another $35.00 through Amazon. Other than that I any still happy with my purchase and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jerome Hoxton
Reviews.Content: No issues whatsoever.  Great picture, easy set up.  Only minor drawback is that the USB ports are in a slightly inconvenient location but no reason not to consider this product.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Nina G. "Amazon addict"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television from another store. Less than a year, it went out. It was still covered under the Westinghouse warranty. It took 30 days to get a case number. Then it took another 2 weeks to get a RMA for me to return the tv. I had to pay for shipping which was $167. They told me it would take 10 to 15 days before they sent the replacement. I called back 20 business days later and the young man told me it was on the dock to be shipped. 8 business days later, I call back and it's back ordered by two weeks. Two weeks later, it's another 2 weeks. Then they wanted to replace it with a 55" LCD after I reported them to the BBB and the CAG. I took the tv bc I wanted a tv in my den. I got the 55" and it was a dud. It has too much red, the base is melted, and the model number has been cut off and a paper label with a different model number is just stuck on there and it's peeling. DO NOT BUY A WESTINGHOUSE PRODUCT!! Any company that has a social media pages stated "WE HATE WESTINGHOUSE" and they have valid reasons why, has to be a rip off. To get a refund for a tv I sent back and they have had for over 10 weeks should not take an additional 8 weeks to release a refund.

Reviews.Title: I have two of them may pick up extra 2 for office.
Reviews.Author: Marcin Kozyra
Reviews.Content: I usually don't write reviews. But I got to admit I really like this tv I bought two of them when they first came out picture is great at first I didn't like the sound but after using it for some time Iam fully happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality very poor
Reviews.Author: collette tyrell-brown
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is poor, remote control is  crappie,  the base of the television came with scratch all over.i guess I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Horrible 50" TV
Reviews.Author: ja-kid
Reviews.Content: The only thing good about this TV is the 50 inch size.  The speakers are in the back, and no matter how high you crank the volume it does not seem to matter.  You get a lot of color blooming discoloration (solarization) when you watch a non-HD program.  There is no regular RCA, or earphone audio output.  You have to point the remote to the left lower corner for the TV to respond to it (that is where they put the sensor instead of in the center), also you have to keep resetting the previous-channel button for it to work properly, so you can flip back and forth.  If you mis-dial a channel that don't exist, the whole screen will go blank, and you have to wait (about 20 seconds) for it to reset, it will not let you re-dial, or cancel you mistake until it is ready. There is no way to scroll the program content description if there is more info than fits in the field on the screen at one time, the information is just chopped off.  You also can't see what program is coming up next (no screen schedule).A different company must have made the 50 inch model for Westinghouse, because the design features and its remote is very different from the 40 inch Westinghouse model.  I love the 40 inch model and its remote functions!

Reviews.Title: Worked great for 8 months then broke and warranty is useless
Reviews.Author: Rachel Neva
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from Target on Black Friday. 8 months later, half the screen has gone dark. Called the company about the warranty (about 3 times since they kept forgetting to call me back), they said to ship the TV to them in California. I live in Boston. FedEx told me it would cost $80 just to pack it up and I'm guessing another $150 to ship it. I'd rather buy a new TV than spend that money to ship this piece of junk. Also, my warranty card says TVs bigger than 50in qualify for in-home diagnostic and repair. Westinghouse is acting like I have a Master's degree but don't know how to read or comprehend basic instruction. Save yourself the trouble and avoid Westinghouse.

Reviews.Title: More good than bad.
Reviews.Author: Munkey.
Reviews.Content: I've had a Westinghouse flatscreen TV for just over a year. I've had nary a problem. It has ample input and output slots for various electronic devises and the picture quality is an an 8 out of 10, in my book. Sound reaches peak at about 40 with almost zero static, however the loudness factor hits a monotone, the louder it goes--an almost muffled monotone. I'm in the process of purchasing a home-theater system, because I am now living in a larger apartment; but in the last year it's been perfect for my --then-- studio. For the price, it's a great TV and I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good Try Westinghouse...
Reviews.Author: ezfrom "Techno"
Reviews.Content: Sound was very poor and picture quality varied vastly.  Sports channels were ok but others were very bad.  Even for a $500 - $600 TV, you would expect more.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Has great picture quality, the only drawback is that it does not have outlets for surround sound. Had to hook them up through the blue ray player.

Reviews.Title: M
Reviews.Author: Amanda north
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal !  Was worried at first but the tv is amazing! The picture is clear as day

Reviews.Title: tv is what you expect, but westinghouse doesnt honor warranty
Reviews.Author: David Arth
Reviews.Content: Our tv broke and they approved our exchange.  However, we have called week after week and after 3 months, still waiting for our replacement.  Something to consider when purchasing from Westinghouse.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: michael kandel
Reviews.Content: Met all of my ezpectations and more, picture is very good, tv is light overall I am very happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Sarah Brooks "Sarah"
Reviews.Content: bought for my husband since he wanted a bigger television and it is perfect the sound quality is good and the picture is clear and perfect

Reviews.Title: AppleTV Remote Accidentally Activates TV Setup Mode
Reviews.Author: jason stevens
Reviews.Content: WARNING: The remote control shares IR channels with AppleTV. This means that using the AppleTV remote will activate the setup menu sequence on the Westinghouse which requires you to pick up the Westinghouse remote and press 10 buttons to get rid of the menu. Westinghouse customer service was very quick to respond:"Hello _____,It seems the signal is interfering with the remote please aim at the box and not the television unfortunately this is a signal interfering with the unit."Thank you Westinghouse for telling me what I already told you the problem was.Purchased from Micro Center this summer for $450. Big TV for a low price but the remote issue is totally annoying. The only fix is to upgrade to an AVR with HDMI switching so I can tape up the remote sensor on the TV.

Reviews.Title: Spend the extra money on a better TV...broke in less than 6 months
Reviews.Author: Stephen Fisher
Reviews.Content: Bought the TV back in April and in October it completely died.  Had to ship it back to California and pay for the shipping.  It has now been 3 weeks and they are still telling me that they can't send me my new TV yet.  Don't waste your time or money on this piece of junk and spend the extra few dollars on a better/more reliable brand.P.S. - the picture on my LCD was just as good as the picture on this LED

Reviews.Title: Do NOT BUY WESTINGHOUSE
Reviews.Author: L C
Reviews.Content: Bought westinghouse tv jan 2012---aug 2013- tv does not work. after doing research all westinghouse tv's are no good, so please stay away from any westinghouse tv, trust me.

ProductInfo.Features:
50" LED back-lit screen
Full 1080P resolution
120Hz refresh rate
3 HDMI ports and Digital TV tuner
ProductInfo.Name: Westinghouse DW50F1Y1 50-Inch 1080p 120Hz LED HDTV
